name: National Green Tribunal
description: Specialized body established for effective and expeditious disposal of cases relating to environmental protection, conservation of forests and other natural resources.

name: National Green Tribunal, Eastern Zone Bench
description: Eastern Zone Bench of the National Green Tribunal serving eastern states of India.
location: Eastern Zone Bench, Kolkata, West Bengal 700020
geographicalJurisdiction: West Bengal, Bihar, Jharkhand, Odisha, Andaman & Nicobar Islands

name: National Green Tribunal, Western Zone Bench
description: Western Zone Bench of the National Green Tribunal serving western states of India.
location: Western Zone Bench, Pune, Maharashtra 411005
geographicalJurisdiction: Maharashtra, Gujarat, Goa, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Daman and Diu

name: National Green Tribunal, Central Zone Bench
description: Central Zone Bench of the National Green Tribunal serving central states of India.
location: Central Zone Bench, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462016

name: National Green Tribunal, Southern Zone Bench
description: Southern Zone Bench of the National Green Tribunal serving southern states of India.
location: Southern Zone Bench, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600104
geographicalJurisdiction: Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Puducherry, Lakshadweep

name: Income Tax Appellate Tribunal
description: Quasi-judicial institution dealing with appeals under the Income Tax Act and other direct tax laws.
location: Principal Bench, ITAT Bhawan, Maharshi Karve Road, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400020

name: Customs, Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal
description: Tribunal that hears appeals against orders passed by the Commissioners of Customs and Excise and Service Tax.
location: Principal Bench, West Block No. 2, R.K. Puram, New Delhi, Delhi 110066

name: National Company Law Tribunal
description: Quasi-judicial body adjudicating issues relating to Indian companies.
location: Principal Bench, Block No. 3, CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110003

name: National Company Law Appellate Tribunal
description: Appellate tribunal that hears appeals from the orders of National Company Law Tribunal.
location: Vigyan Bhawan Annexe, Maulana Azad Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110011
caseTypes: Appeals under Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code

name: Securities Appellate Tribunal
description: Statutory body established to hear appeals against orders passed by SEBI, IRDAI, and PFRDA.
location: Earnest House, 14th Floor, Nariman Point, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400021

name: Debt Recovery Tribunal
description: Specialized tribunal established to facilitate the recovery of debts due to banks and financial institutions.
location: DRT-I, 4th Floor, Jeevan Tara Building, Parliament Street, New Delhi, Delhi 110001

name: Debt Recovery Appellate Tribunal
description: Appellate tribunal that hears appeals from the orders of Debt Recovery Tribunals.
location: 4th Floor, Jeevan Tara Building, Parliament Street, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
geographicalJurisdiction: Delhi, Haryana, Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, Jammu & Kashmir, Chandigarh

name: Central Administrative Tribunal
description: Tribunal established to adjudicate disputes and complaints with respect to recruitment and conditions of service of public servants.
location: Principal Bench, 61/35, Copernicus Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
caseTypes: Service matters of central government employees

name: Armed Forces Tribunal
description: Tribunal established for the adjudication of disputes and complaints with respect to commission, appointments, enrolments and service conditions of military personnel.
location: Principal Bench, West Block-VIII, Sector-1, R.K. Puram, New Delhi, Delhi 110066
caseTypes: Service matters of armed forces personnel

name: Railway Claims Tribunal
description: Tribunal established to provide speedy justice to the victims of railway accidents and to the public whose goods are lost or damaged during rail transit.
location: Principal Bench, 13/15, Mall Road, Delhi 110054
caseTypes: Claims for compensation for loss of life/injury in train accidents
Claims for goods lost/damaged during rail transit

name: Telecom Disputes Settlement and Appellate Tribunal
description: Tribunal established to adjudicate disputes and dispose of appeals with a view to protect the interests of service providers and consumers of the telecom sector.
location: Room No. 478, Hotel Samrat, Kautilya Marg, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, Delhi 110021

name: Intellectual Property Appellate Board
description: Tribunal established to hear appeals against the decisions of the Registrar under the Trade Marks Act, Geographical Indications Act, and Patents Act.

name: National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission
description: Quasi-judicial commission established to protect consumer rights and provide speedy redressal of consumer disputes.

name: Competition Appellate Tribunal
description: Tribunal established to hear and dispose of appeals against the orders of the Competition Commission of India.

name: Appellate Tribunal for Electricity
description: Tribunal established to hear appeals against orders of the regulatory commissions in the electricity sector.

name: Appellate Tribunal for Foreign Exchange
